Allen Iverson , playing with an injured big toe, scored 44 points, including 30 in the final 19 minutes, as the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Toronto Raptors 106-93 Wednesday night in a preview of a potential first-round series in the Eastern Conference playoffs. "When you have that type of quality player come in, you want to step it up, Allen Iverson said. "When you add to that he's coming into my house, I want to play good in front of my fans. Simon Cowell - who has an estimated personal fortune of over Â£ 165m- admits he was never academically successful but believes he has done well out of life because he has such good instincts. He said: All my life I had to teach myself. I never really had a proper education. I wasn't born with any skill. I didn't learn anything from school. "Mainly, I trust my instincts because I have very broad tastes. I genuinely believe that if I like something, other people are going to like it as well.
